EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Berlin - Day Before
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Berlin.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 22nd, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/berlin]]>
Location Ahoy! Berlin Wattstraße 11 (Haus 1/Aufgang 1) 13355 Berlin Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Mitte,+Wattstra%C3%9Fe+11,+13355+Berlin,+Germany/@52.5413709,13.3878238,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x47a851f45ebb0f3b:0x2e6a58f7020b76e9!8m2!3d52.5413677!4d13.3900125]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
